snippet: A video of a Chinese father forcing his 4-year-old son to run nearly naked through the snow in New York has drawn increasing attention and online comments after it appeared on Internet sites in China.
abstract: A video of a Chinese father forcing his 4-year-old son to run nearly naked through the snow in New York has drawn increasing attention and online comments after it appeared on Internet sites in China.

headline.main: A Parenting Class, Conducted In the Snow
